full_summary:
"TSPS Solutions Stream 2: Applicant Support and Capacity Building – Solicitation #1000251835
Tender Reference Number: cb-332-16285578
Revised Solicitation Number: 1000251835
Revised Solicitation Date: November 17, 2023

**Contract Overview** {#contract-overview}

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites eligible contractors to participate in the tender process for TSPS Solutions Stream 2: Applicant Support and Capacity Building under Solicitation #1000251835. The contract is to support applicants in Community Action Program for Children and Canada Prenatal Nutrition Program through a series of webinars, individual, and/or group support.

**Objectives** {#objectives}

- To promote an equity-driven approach in the application process
- To support applicants to develop strong applications and address community-identified needs
- To ensure reach to priority populations

**Scope of Work** {#scope-of-work}

- Deliver a series of webinars on PHAC's application process
- Provide individual, and/or group support to applicants
- Assist applicants in developing strong applications
- Support priority populations and address community-identified needs

**Contract Period** {#contract-period}

- Contract commences on the date of contract award
- Contract closes on March 31, 2025

**Administrative Information** {#administrative-information}

- Point of Contact: Drew Johnson
- Email: drew.johnson@hc-sc.gc.ca
- Phone: Not provided
- Note: Please see Solicitation #1000251835 for complete contact information.

**Notice Documentation**

The solicitation can be found at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25079/tsps-npp-%28english-1000251835.pdf 

and 

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25079/tsps-npp-%28french-1000251835.pdf

**Closing Date and Time**

- Tender Closing Date: December 21, 2023 at 14:00:00 EST
- Note: Tenders must be submitted in English or French. **Late tenders will not be accepted**."



Kent Opal  
June 11th, 2033.
